text:
The submit button of the oneform editor is disabled and can't be enabled in the 
Internet Explorer, so it's not possible to store documents with IE.
creator: rudolf.korhummel@uniklinik-freiburg.de

text:
Strange, actually the browser check doesn't seem to be necessary. I removed it, it works for me now in the following browsers:

* Firefox 3
* IE 6
* Safari 3, 4 beta
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: Tested with IE 8, seems to work.
